sentence.text: Intriguingly, one of the most frequently altered genes, mutated exclusively by inactivating mutation, was endosome to lysosome transport via multivesicular body sorting pathway (10%), which may represent a novel cancer gene in chordoma.Chordoma is a rare often incurable malignant bone tumour.

entity.text: endosome to lysosome transport via multivesicular body sorting pathway

sentence.text: Here, the authors investigate driver mutations of sporadic chordoma in 104 cases, revealing duplications in notochordal transcription factor brachyury (T), PI3K signalling mutations, and mutations in endosome to lysosome transport via multivesicular body sorting pathway, a potential novel cancer gene in chordoma

entity.text: endosome to lysosome transport via multivesicular body sorting pathway
